/* cetusUserStatusHist.userStatusHistList */ SELECT CUSH.UID AS HIST_UID ,CUSH.USER_UID ,CUSH.WORKPLACE_UID ,CUSH.REASON ,CUSH.STATUS ,CASE WHEN CUSH.STATUS = 'APPROVED' THEN '사용중' WHEN CUSH.STATUS = 'WAIT' THEN '승인 대기' WHEN CUSH.STATUS = 'STOP' THEN '정지' END AS STATUS_NM ,CUSH.REG_UID ,TO_CHAR(CUSH.REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM') AS REG_DT ,CU.USER_NM AS REG_NM ,CU.USER_ID AS REG_ID FROM CETUS_USER_STATUS_HIST CUSH LEFT JOIN CETUS_USER CU ON CU.UID = CUSH.REG_UID WHERE CUSH.USER_UID = #{userUid} ORDER BY CUSH.REG_DT DESC
OFFSET ${startNumber} LIMIT ${endNumber}

/* cetusUserStatusHist.userStatusHistExcelList */ SELECT CU.USER_ID || ' (' || CU.USER_NM || ')' AS USER_INFO ,CW.NAME AS WORKPLACE_NM ,CUSH.REASON ,CUSH.STATUS ,CASE WHEN CUSH.STATUS = 'APPROVED' THEN '사용중' WHEN CUSH.STATUS = 'WAIT' THEN '승인 대기' WHEN CUSH.STATUS = 'STOP' THEN '정지' END AS STATUS_NM ,TO_CHAR(CUSH.REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM') AS REG_DT ,CU_REG.USER_ID || ' (' || CU_REG.USER_NM || ')' AS REG_INFO FROM CETUS_USER_STATUS_HIST CUSH INNER JOIN CETUS_USER CU ON CU.UID = CUSH.USER_UID INNER JOIN CETUS_WORKPLACE_USER CWU ON CWU.USER_UID = CUSH.USER_UID INNER JOIN CETUS_WORKPLACE CW ON CW.UID = CWU.WORKPLACE_UID LEFT JOIN CETUS_USER CU_REG ON CU_REG.UID = CUSH.REG_UID WHERE CUSH.USER_UID = #{userUid} ORDER BY CUSH.REG_DT DESC
OFFSET ${startNumber} LIMIT ${endNumber}
